posts.post_title: WTB 8 T204 Ramly's 's to Complete Set
posts.post_content:

1) Beebe
2) Bowerman
3) Burkett - HOF
4) Crandall
5) Ganley
6) Knight
7) Manning
8) Sweeney

Also looking for replacement cards for:
1) Ball, Jim
2) McIntyre
3) Paskert

Please contact me either on Net54 or at [url]mikebrailey@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks,
Mike
